info.title: Concert Management API
info.description: A simple API for managing music concert information

get.description: List concerts with optional pagination. Returns an array of concerts sorted by date.

post.description: Create a new concert entry. All fields are required to ensure complete concert information.

get.description: Get a single concert by its unique ID.

put.description: Update an existing concert by ID. Only provided fields will be updated.

parameters.name: concertID
parameters.description: ID of the concert to update

delete.description: Remove a concert from the system by ID. This operation cannot be undone.

parameters.name: concertID
parameters.description: ID of the concert to remove

Concert.title: Concert

artist.description: The main performer for this concert

date.description: The date when the concert will take place

venue.description: The venue where the concert will be held
venue.example: Madison Square Garden, New York, NY
